participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was ulitimately productive in meeting the needs of design for the remote.
A final decision was reached on the prototype and overall the product appears to have turned out rather well.
The team did an excellent job of working together to create a product that is both fancy and functional, promoting the fashion-forward image of our technological company.

participant_decisions.sent: Gunmetal grey plastic base, interchangeable latex covers.
transparent blue buttons with illumination on touch.
bright yellow base RR logo. single curvature for prototype, side buttons.
Prototype is a go - under production costs.
